Package com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic

Class ShelterService

java.lang.Object
com.zoi4erom.animalnetworkbook.businesslogic.ShelterService
public class ShelterService extends Object
Provides functionality related to animal shelters.

  • Method Details

    • createShelterValidation

      public static List<String> createShelterValidation(String name, String address, String phone, int capacityOfAnimals)
      Validates and creates a new animal shelter.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the shelter
      address - the address of the shelter
      phone - the phone number of the shelter
      capacityOfAnimals - the capacity of animals that the shelter can accommodate
      Returns:
      a list of validation errors or an empty list if validation is successful

    • deleteShelterByName

      public static Boolean deleteShelterByName(String name)
      Deletes an animal shelter by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the shelter to delete
      Returns:
      true if the shelter is successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • updateShelter

      public static void updateShelter(Shelter updatedShelter)
      Updates an existing animal shelter.
      Parameters:
      updatedShelter - the updated shelter

    • getShelterById

      public static Shelter getShelterById(UUID shelterId)
      Retrieves an animal shelter by its ID.
      Parameters:
      shelterId - the ID of the shelter to retrieve
      Returns:
      the shelter with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • findShelterByName

      public static Shelter findShelterByName(String name)
      Finds an animal shelter by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the shelter to find
      Returns:
      the shelter with the specified name, or null if not found

    • findShelterByMaxAnimals

      public static Shelter findShelterByMaxAnimals(int maxAnimals)
      Finds an animal shelter by its maximum capacity of animals.
      Parameters:
      maxAnimals - the maximum capacity of animals of the shelter to find
      Returns:
      the shelter with the specified maximum capacity of animals, or null if not found
